Nodes.name: Villager:
Nodes.text: I've never seen you here before. Have you travelled far?

Nodes.name: Villager:
Nodes.text: That's neat! You will have to tell me all about your home some time.

Nodes.name: Villager:
Nodes.text: Hmm. Well, either you have been living under a rock, or I have. But I'm pretty sure it's not me.
